articles.author: Olivia McCormack
articles.title: SNL host Shane Gillis tells audience not to Google why he was fired in 2019 - The Washington Post
articles.description: Gillis hosted “Saturday Night Live” five years after he was dropped from the show for previous anti-Asian and homophobic comments.
articles.content: Comedian Shane Gillis started his monologue as the host of Saturday Night Live by addressing the elephant in the room. Yep, Im here, he said. I was fired from this show a while ago, but dont look tha… [+2795 chars]

articles.title: Wendy Williams thanks fans for support after dementia and aphasia diagnosis - BBC.com
articles.description: The talk show host says she feels "immense gratitude" for the supportive messages sent to her.
articles.content:
